mapper.insert: insert into meetup values((select coalesce(max(m_id),0)+1 from meetup), #{title},#{info},#{c_key},#{w_date}, #{price},#{w_id},#{imagename})
mapper.select: select count(*) from meetup where title like '%' || #{title} || '%'
select m.*, (select c.name from category c where c.c_key = m.c_key) as category_name from meetup m where m.m_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update meetup set title=#{title}, info=#{info}, c_key=#{c_key}, price=#{price}, w_date=#{w_date}, imagename=#{imagename} where m_id=#{m_id}
